channel.title: Ggplot2 on Learining R world
channel.description: Recent content in Ggplot2 on Learining R world

item.title: Graphs in R
item.description: Creating Graphs Let’s start by importing the libraries we will need to plot a graph. We would need dplyr to do the data manipulations Lahman to get the data about all the baseball players for our plots And lastly, ggplot2 and ggiraph are needed for the graphs. library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) library(Lahman) library(ggiraph) Now that we have our libraries/packages, Let’s do some data maipulation using dplyr We will search for all the players who have homeruns more than 400 in their careers.
